title: Trump says stock market is 'way up'
text:
Trump says stock market is 'way up' Saturday, March 24, 2018 - 00:36 
President Trump said the stock market is 'way up' as Wall Street struggles to shake off fears of a global trade war after the U.S. moved to slap tariffs on China. Rough Cut (no reporter narration). ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript 
President Trump said the stock market is 'way up' as Wall Street struggles to shake off fears of a global trade war after the U.S. moved to slap tariffs on China. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
